151.title: Cardcaptor Sakura

1511.content:
Sakura was sitting in her seat waiting for class to started. She sighed, school was boring she thought. A few days ago she went down to her father study and after she heard something noises down there. She soon found a weird book, it was glowing. Her better judgement told her not to touch it, but her curiosity got the better of her.

She grabbed the book and opened it. She found a series of exotic cards, she spoke one of those cards name out loud.
Windy she called out, and suddenly a whirlwind surrounded her and sent the rest of the cards flying.

Then a strange creature come out of the book. He said his name of Cerberus the guardian beast of the Clow cards.

Sakura thought he was cute, he does look likes a stuff animal.
When he realized the Clow cards where gone, he started freaking out.

Sakura calm him down, with pudding. Soon hee told her what the Clow cards where and how dangerous they where. Sakura blushed, she felt horrible letting things that where so dangerous out.

She told him it was accident, if their was anything she could do to help him. He grinned, then he summon a key from the book. Sakura touch it and it transformed into a wand.

He told her, she was the a cardcaptor and it was her responsible to capture the Clow cards.

At first Sakura tried to refuse it, but he told her if she opened and release the card. Then it was her job to capture them.

Sakura sighed in defeat, he had a point. This was Sakura's fault so it only make sense for her to fix it. Later that night she captured the Fly card and over the next few days she captured a few more.

Luckily her best friend Tomoyo figured out what was happening. She was overjoyed to help Sakura with this magical girl adventure she called it. She even started making costumes for her to wear during her adventure.

Sakura blushed thinking about those costumes. They were all sexy and skimpy, she would die of embarrassment if anyone else saw her in one.

Tomoyo arrived in class, she took her seat next to her. They said talked until class started.

" Class, we're getting a transfer student form Hong Kong today. Please welcome Li Shaoli." Said her teacher.

Sakura turned to see the new girl and she blushed.

The girl was gorgeous, with long chocolate color hair and Amber eyes. The school uniform showed off all of her curves.

Sakura started mentally undressing the new girl. She was snapped out of her daydream when the teacher told Shaoli to take the seat behind her.

Sakura just watched as the new girl took her seat behind her. Shaoli just glared at her, it was like she hated her. That didn't make sense, she never meet Shaoli until today.

Sakura had to talk to her later, to find out why she was acting like this.

What happen next ?
1511.title: Shaoli arrvies

When class was finish and the girls were taking their shower. Some how Sakura and Shaoli were alone as they took their.

Sakura had to use all her self control, so not to stare at Shaoli's wet, soap covered naked body. Thoughts of shoving Shaoli against the wall and making out with her filled Sakura's mind.

She shook her head, she just meet Shaoli and now she wanted to make out with her.

Sakura was so caught up in her own thoughts, she didn't notice Shaoli slipping on some soap and crashing into her.

When Sakura opened her eyes, she gulped. She was on top of Shaoli, their large breasts squeezing against each other. Their lips only inch's apart, their legs intertwined.

155.title: More Anime

info.brief_description: Think of any anime and twist the cast around by swapping their genders.
info.description: Any anime that you can think of can have their genders switched in this story. For example, an anime with a healthy cast of females is gonna be switched to dudes, and vice versa. Sex is encouraged in this story, just nothing to extreme. Things I don’t allow: anything involving human waste, no actual rape(roleplaying is fine), nothing bloody, no beastiality, no incest. Things of that nature. Anything else is fair game. Have fun and don’t be shy to add. If I or anyone else have a problem, I will deal with it accordingly.
